Description:
FUNDING UNDER THIS AWARD TO THE WEST VIRGINIA  EXECUTIVE OFFICE, IS CRITICAL TO ENSURING THE SAFE TRANSPORTATION OF HAZARDOUS MATERIALS BY TRAINING EMERGENCY RESPONDERS TO RESPOND TO PIPELINE INCIDENTS, TO PROTECT NEARBY PERSONS, PROPERTY, AND THE ENVIRONMENT FROM THE EFFECTS OF PIPELINE ACCIDENTS OR INCIDENTS INVOLVING THE TRANSPORTATION OF HAZARDOUS MATERIALS.  
APPLICANTS IDENTIFY SPECIFIC TRAINING PROJECTS BASED ON NEEDS, AND PHMSA MEASURES PERFORMANCE BASED ON FULFILLMENT OF THE TRAINING NEEDS OUTLINED IN THE STATEMENT OF NEED.
